EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Datalink and PFM Team Up to Deliver an Improved Connected Experience for You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.pfmsys.com/]]>
Big news from Honeywell GoDirect™ Flight Services <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/flight-services]]>! We’ve integrated our aircraft datalink data with Professional Flight Management (PFM) <[[https://www.pfmsys.com/]]> operations management services.
Now you can link your datalink position & OOOI reports to PFM systems to import flight times into PFM, send flight following notifications and follow your flight on map in real-time!
What this means for you:
- Improved efficiency for your operation - share meaningful data between your two most important systems
- Reduced flight log errors and inaccuracies by avoiding human errors
- More situational awareness – real-time location reporting lets you track your aircraft through all phases of flight
- Send enhanced flight notifications – keep your team (flight operations, passenger’s executive assistants and security) updated for better planning
To take advantage of this integrated offering you must be an active GoDirect Datalink <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect-datalink]]> and PFM subscriber. Not set up today? Contact our accounts team via email FlightServices@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:FlightServices@Honeywell.com]]>. Our Honeywell Flight Services representatives will assist in the account set up to enable this data forwarding service.
Honeywell GoDirect Team
